features: 【Premium Composite Board】The board is made of long lasting engineered wood, The interior is made from recycled and sustainable materials, ensuring stability while being environmentally friendly. Its surface is not only scratch-resistant but also remarkably easy to clean. We prioritize both quality and value to bring you exceptional spaces every time.

【Ample Storage Space】This bedside table has a spacious countertop, open shelves and closed storage cabinets. Our bedside table is designed to seamlessly integrate into your bedroom, offering a harmonious blend of form and function. Experience the convenience of triple storage space and transform your bedside area into a haven of organization and sophistication.

【Durable Hardware & Sturdy Structure】 Built to last, our nightstand incorporates durable hardware and a sturdy structure. Both the table and side panels are made of 24mm thickened wooden boards, each detail ensures resilience against wear and tear, providing you with enduring quality and peace of mind.

【Multifunction End Table】 With its versatile design, this bedside table effortlessly complements any bedroom or living room decor. Use it as a nightstand by your bed, a sofa side end table, or even as additional storage in your entryway – a versatile piece to enhance your home's aesthetic.

【Effortless Assembly】 Setting up your new Nightstand is a hassle-free process thanks to the provided clear and concise assembly instructions. Spend less time on assembly and more time enjoying the modern aesthetics and practicality this piece brings to your living space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for Sofa Side Tables
reviews.reviewText: Easy assembly, nice height for my sofa. They also conceal my work bag and medicine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars If it’s around 80$ i recommend
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. If its not 80$ than you decide. Upon opening the box I noticed some of the pieces were dirty and stained. Assembly was easy, I did it by myself in an hour. The knob is NOT metal like the description claims. It’s plastic painted gold. Again if it’s priced around 80$ for 2 than no biggie especially since you already knew that this is not a quality product, it’s a need this for a good price product. I purchased for a second guest room that will probably never get used so price was good for what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not even Ikea quality
reviews.reviewText: My first impression unboxing this side table was not great. It feels cheap and (as you can see in the photo) one of the corners is messed up out of the box. It was pretty easy to assemble, although even the connectors don't feel secure so I have serious doubts that it'll last. I would expect this from a table half the price, but I'm a little disappointed given the $60 price tag. I'd look for another option if you have a $60 budget for a side table.Full Disclosure: I received this product as part of the Amazon Vine program, but my review is entirely my own and not altered at all by my participation in the Vine program. The program asks that we review the products we receive, but it doesn’t specify that the reviews should be positive or a specific star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the best but does its work
reviews.reviewText: The item arrived well packaged. Though I do have complaints on the scratches here & there on a new item as such. The whole assembly took roughly 30 mins as the instruction manual was easy to follow.All the accessories/screws etc came with the package & I just needed a screwdriver.One complaint that I have though is the back panel, which I found to be a bit longer causing the gaps that you can see in one of the pics. Its not end of the world though.Still adds beauty to my living room with its pristine white color.Recommeded!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth for money,sturdy product
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Good product and worth for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid strong large end table/nightstand
reviews.reviewText: I got this to use in my bedroom as a nightstand but I decided to use it as an end table next to my couch instead. It’s very well made and the wood is much thicker than the other nightstands I looked at. It was easy to assemble taking about 20 minutes or so. It has plenty of storage inside as well as some in the cubby above. I highly recommend this table due to the fact that it’s a lot stronger and thicker than the competition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my teenager. I didn’t want anything too fancy as she is my clumsy one and has ruined many pieces of furniture. So this was perfect for that. However, I would not order it again. I have put together quite a bit of cheap furniture. This is in the top 5 of frustrating furniture. I was already expecting cheap so yeah didn’t have high hopes. Everything was off by a tad and I was struggling to a line pieces. There is a gap at the door when closed. Not as sold as I like it to be. I can’t overly complain because it works still 😂 it is cute and simple and that’s what I wanted. Was packaged well and everything was in good condition. Overall it was just ok. It is what it is but wouldn’t buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars very cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: i have built a lot of flat pack furniture and this one is by far the least desirable one. the holes were mis-aligned and the cams broke out with light tension. beware when pushing in the pins as the white veneer is only as thick as about 3 human hairs.
